title: The Death of Football P3: All Is Lost
description: All is Lost. All is Lost. All is Lost. All is Lost.

fragments.text: What you need is a Coach Chicken named Nugget

We are in the 2030's, Genetic cloning has become a norm, the NFL is a shambling corpse of what it was, and to continue having any players who want to play for the league, they've had to resort to create an R+D lab to breed new blood into the life of the game.
